00032 #include <glib.h>
00033 #include <string.h>
00034 #include <dbus/dbus-glib.h>
00035 #include "gpm-main.h"
00036 #include "gpm-common.h"
00037 
00038 #include "dbus-common.h"
00039 #include "glibhal-main.h"
00040 #include "glibhal-extras.h"
00041 
00042 #ifndef DOXYGEN_SHOULD_SKIP_THIS
00043 
00044 #define GPM_DBUS_TEST_APP "GNOME Power Test"
00045 
00046 DBusGProxy *gpm_proxy;
00047 DBusGProxy *signal_proxy;
00048 
00049 static gboolean doACK = FALSE;
00050 static gboolean doNACK = FALSE;
00051 
00052 static void
00053 signal_handler_mainsStatusChanged (DBusGProxy *proxy, gboolean value, gpointer user_data)
00054 {
00055     g_print ("mainsStatusChanged received: AC = %i\n", value);
00056 }
00057 
00058 static void
00059 signal_handler_performingAction (DBusGProxy *proxy, gint value, gpointer user_data)
00060 {
00061     GString *flags = convert_gpmdbus_to_string (value);
00062     g_print ("performingAction received: ENUM = %s\n", flags->str);
00063     g_string_free (flags, TRUE);
00064 }
00065 
00066 static void
00067 signal_handler_actionAboutToHappen (DBusGProxy *proxy, gint value, gpointer user_data)
00068 {
00069     GString *flags = convert_gpmdbus_to_string (value);
00070     GError *error = NULL;
00071     gboolean boolret;
00072 
00073     g_print ("actionAboutToHappen received: ENUM = %s\n", flags->str);
00074     g_string_free (flags, TRUE);
00075 
00076 
00077     if (doACK)
00078         if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "vetoACK", &error, 
00079                 G_TYPE_INT, value, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00080                 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00081             dbus_glib_error (error);
00082     if (doNACK)
00083         if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "vetoNACK", &error, 
00084                 G_TYPE_INT, value, G_TYPE_STRING, "Unsaved file needs to be saved.", G_TYPE_INVALID,
00085                 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00086             dbus_glib_error (error);
00087 }
00088 
00089 static void
00090 name_owner_changed (DBusGProxy *proxy, const char *name, const char *prev_owner, const char *new_owner, gpointer user_data)
00091 {
00092     g_print ("(signal NameOwnerChanged) name owner changed for %s from %s to %s\n",
00093                 name, prev_owner, new_owner);
00094 }
00095 
00099 static void print_usage (void)
00100 {
00101     g_print ("\nusage : gnome-power-dbus-test [options]\n");
00102     g_print (
00103         "\n"
00104         "       --help               Show this information and exit\n"
00105         "\n"
00106         " METHODS\n"
00107         "       --isUserIdle         Checks if the user is idle\n"
00108         "       --isRunningOnMains   Checks to see if user is running on mains\n"
00109         "       --isActive           Checks to see if user is active\n");
00110     g_print (
00111         " MONITOR\n"
00112         "       --monitor            Monitors bus, outputing to consol\n"
00113         "       --doNothing          ActionRegister, then does nothing on actionAboutToHappen.\n"
00114         "       --doACK              ActionRegister, then does vetoACK on actionAboutToHappen\n"
00115         "       --doNACK             ActionRegister, then does vetoNACK on actionAboutToHappen\n"
00116         " SYNC\n"
00117         "       --registerUnregister Abuses ActionRegister and ActionUnregister\n"
00118         "       --wrongACK           Abuses ACK and NACK"
00119         "\n");
00120 }
00121 
00122 int
00123 main (int argc, char **argv)
00124 {
00125     GMainLoop *loop = NULL;
00126     DBusGConnection *session_connection = NULL;
00127     DBusGProxy *dbus_proxy = NULL;
00128     GError *error = NULL;
00129     gboolean isOkay;
00130     gboolean doMonitor;
00131     gboolean boolret;
00132     int a;
00133 
00134     /* initialise threads */
00135     g_type_init ();
00136     if (!g_thread_supported ())
00137         g_thread_init (NULL);
00138     dbus_g_thread_init ();
00139 
00140     /* Create a new event loop to run in */
00141     loop = g_main_loop_new (NULL, FALSE);
00142 
00143     /* Get a connection to the session connection */
00144     if (!dbus_get_session_connection (&session_connection))
00145         return FALSE;
00146     gpm_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name (session_connection,
00147             GPM_DBUS_SERVICE,
00148             GPM_DBUS_PATH,
00149             GPM_DBUS_INTERFACE);
00150     signal_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name (session_connection,
00151             GPM_DBUS_SERVICE,
00152             GPM_DBUS_PATH,
00153             GPM_DBUS_INTERFACE);
00154 
00155     dbus_g_proxy_add_signal (signal_proxy, "mainsStatusChanged", 
00156         G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00157     dbus_g_proxy_connect_signal (signal_proxy, "mainsStatusChanged", 
00158         G_CALLBACK (signal_handler_mainsStatusChanged), NULL, NULL);
00159 
00160     dbus_g_proxy_add_signal (signal_proxy, "performingAction", 
00161         G_TYPE_INT, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00162     dbus_g_proxy_connect_signal (signal_proxy, "performingAction", 
00163         G_CALLBACK (signal_handler_performingAction), NULL, NULL);
00164 
00165     dbus_g_proxy_add_signal (signal_proxy, "actionAboutToHappen", 
00166         G_TYPE_INT, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00167     dbus_g_proxy_connect_signal (signal_proxy, "actionAboutToHappen", 
00168         G_CALLBACK (signal_handler_actionAboutToHappen), NULL, NULL);
00169 
00170     /* add session connection tracking */
00171     dbus_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name (session_connection,
00172                             DBUS_SERVICE_DBUS,
00173                             DBUS_PATH_DBUS,
00174                             DBUS_INTERFACE_DBUS);
00175 
00176     dbus_g_proxy_add_signal (dbus_proxy, "NameOwnerChanged",
00177         G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_STRING, G_TYPE_INVALID);
00178     dbus_g_proxy_connect_signal (dbus_proxy, "NameOwnerChanged",
00179         G_CALLBACK (name_owner_changed), NULL, NULL);
00180 
00181     isOkay = FALSE;
00182     doMonitor = FALSE;
00183 
00184     for (a=1; a < argc; a++) {
00185         if (strcmp (argv[a], "--help") == 0) {
00186             print_usage ();
00187             return 1;
00188         } else if (strcmp (argv[a], "--monitor") == 0) {
00189             isOkay = TRUE;
00190             doMonitor = TRUE;
00191         } else if (strcmp (argv[a], "--wrongACK") == 0) {
00192             isOkay = TRUE;
00193             /* 
00194              * testing sending ACK and NACK before Registering
00195              */
00196 
00197             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "Ack", &error, 
00198                                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_ALL, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00199                                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00200                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00201             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "Nack", &error, 
00202                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_ALL, G_TYPE_STRING, "It's a Sunday", G_TYPE_INVALID,
00203                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00204                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00205 
00206         } else if (strcmp (argv[a], "--registerUnregister") == 0) {
00207             isOkay = TRUE;
00208             g_print ("Registering and Unregistering GPM_DBUS_SHUTDOWN\n");
00209             /* 
00210              * testing unregistering before registering
00211              */
00212             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "ActionUnregister", &error, 
00213                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_ALL, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00214                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00215                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00216             /* 
00217              * testing double registering
00218              * TODO : this now fails, but it should pass if the flags are different
00219              */
00220             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "ActionRegister", &error, 
00221                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_SHUTDOWN | GPM_DBUS_LOGOFF, G_TYPE_STRING, GPM_DBUS_TEST_APP, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00222                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00223                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00224             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "ActionRegister", &error, 
00225                                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_SHUTDOWN | GPM_DBUS_LOGOFF, G_TYPE_STRING, GPM_DBUS_TEST_APP, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00226                                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00227                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00228             /* 
00229              * testing double unregistering
00230              */
00231             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "ActionUnregister", &error, 
00232                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_ALL, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00233                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00234                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00235             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "ActionUnregister", &error, 
00236                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_ALL, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00237                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00238                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00239             /* 
00240              * testing program quit (should do automatic disconnect)
00241              */
00242             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "ActionRegister", &error, 
00243                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_SHUTDOWN | GPM_DBUS_LOGOFF, G_TYPE_STRING, GPM_DBUS_TEST_APP, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00244                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00245                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00246         } else if (strcmp (argv[a], "--doACK") == 0) {
00247             isOkay = TRUE;
00248             doMonitor = TRUE;
00249             doACK = TRUE;
00250             g_print ("Testing ACK with monitor\n");
00251             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "ActionRegister", &error, 
00252                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_SHUTDOWN | GPM_DBUS_LOGOFF, G_TYPE_STRING, GPM_DBUS_TEST_APP, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00253                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00254                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00255         } else if (strcmp (argv[a], "--doNACK") == 0) {
00256             isOkay = TRUE;
00257             doMonitor = TRUE;
00258             doNACK = TRUE;
00259             g_print ("Testing NACK with monitor\n");
00260             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "ActionRegister", &error, 
00261                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_SHUTDOWN | GPM_DBUS_LOGOFF, G_TYPE_STRING, GPM_DBUS_TEST_APP, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00262                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00263                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00264         } else if (strcmp (argv[a], "--doNothing") == 0) {
00265             isOkay = TRUE;
00266             doMonitor = TRUE;
00267             g_print ("Testing no-response with monitor\n");
00268             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, "ActionRegister", &error, 
00269                     G_TYPE_INT, GPM_DBUS_SHUTDOWN | GPM_DBUS_LOGOFF, G_TYPE_STRING, GPM_DBUS_TEST_APP, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00270                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00271                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00272         } else if (strcmp (argv[a], "--isUserIdle") == 0 || 
00273                strcmp (argv[a], "--isRunningOnMains") == 0) {
00274             isOkay = TRUE;
00275 
00276             if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gpm_proxy, argv[a]+2, &error, 
00277                     G_TYPE_INVALID,
00278                     G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID))
00279                 dbus_glib_error (error);
00280             if (boolret)
00281                 g_print ("%s TRUE\n", argv[a]+2);
00282             else
00283                 g_print ("%s FALSE\n", argv[a]+2);
00284         }
00285     }
00286     if (!isOkay)
00287         print_usage ();
00288     
00289     if (!doMonitor)
00290         return 0;
00291 
00292     /* Start the event loop */
00293     g_main_loop_run (loop);
00294 
00295     /* close session connections */
00296     g_object_unref (signal_proxy);
00297     g_object_unref (gpm_proxy);
00298     return 0;
00299 }
